pullrequest.title: catkinize drcsim with new atlas model (catkin drcsim 3.1.0 candidate)

content.raw: It would be nice to remove our forked copy of gazebo_plugins from gazebo_ros_pkgs. As John mentioned in the [RoadMap](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Roadmap), this is easy to do on hydro, but not so easy for groovy, since gazebo_ros_pkgs wasn't released into groovy. One option is for us to build and host groovy debs of the packages from gazebo_ros_pkgs that we need, and make them conflict with ros-groovy-simulator-gazebo.
content.html: It would be nice to remove our forked copy of gazebo_plugins from gazebo_ros_pkgs. As John mentioned in the RoadMap, this is easy to do on hydro, but not so easy for groovy, since gazebo_ros_pkgs wasn't released into groovy. One option is for us to build and host groovy debs of the packages from gazebo_ros_pkgs that we need, and make them conflict with ros-groovy-simulator-gazebo.
